TypeSignature.Value: public class ServiceState : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceState extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type ServiceState = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: Contains phone state and service related information.

remarks.para:
Contains phone state and service related information. The following phone information is included in returned ServiceState:
  • Service state: IN_SERVICE, OUT_OF_SERVICE, EMERGENCY_ONLY, POWER_OFF
  • Duplex mode: UNKNOWN, FDD, TDD
  • Roaming indicator
  • Operator name, short name and numeric id
  • Network selection mode
For historical reasons this class is not declared as final; however, it should be treated as though it were final.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the CDMA NID (Network Identification Number), a number uniquely identifying a network within a wireless system.
Docs.value: The CDMA NID or #UNKNOWN_ID if not available.

remarks.para: Get the CDMA NID (Network Identification Number), a number uniquely identifying a network within a wireless system. (Defined in 3GPP2 C.S0023 3.4.8)
Require at least android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION or android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION. Otherwise return #UNKNOWN_ID.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the CDMA SID (System Identification Number), a number uniquely identifying a wireless system.
Docs.value: The CDMA SID or #UNKNOWN_ID if not available.

remarks.para: Get the CDMA SID (System Identification Number), a number uniquely identifying a wireless system. (Defined in 3GPP2 C.S0023 3.4.8)
Require at least android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION or android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION. Otherwise return #UNKNOWN_ID.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the channel number of the current primary serving cell, or -1 if unknown
Docs.value: Channel number of primary serving cell

remarks.para: Get the channel number of the current primary serving cell, or -1 if unknown
This is NRARFCN for NR, EARFCN for LTE, UARFCN for UMTS, and ARFCN for GSM.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: This indicates whether the device is searching for service.
Docs.value: true whenever the modem is searching for service.

remarks.para:
This indicates whether the device is searching for service.
This API reports the modem searching status for AccessNetworkConstants#TRANSPORT_TYPE_WWAN (cellular) service in either NetworkRegistrationInfo#DOMAIN_CS or NetworkRegistrationInfo#DOMAIN_PS. This API will not report searching status for AccessNetworkConstants#TRANSPORT_TYPE_WLAN.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

remarks.para: Get all of the available network registration info.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get current registered operator name in long alphanumeric format.
Docs.value: long name of operator, null if unregistered or unknown

remarks.para:
Get current registered operator name in long alphanumeric format.
In GSM/UMTS, long format can be up to 16 characters long. In CDMA, returns the ERI text, if set. Otherwise, returns the ONS.
Require at least android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION or android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION. Otherwise return null if the caller does not hold neither android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION nor android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get current registered operator name in short alphanumeric format.
Docs.value: short name of operator, null if unregistered or unknown

remarks.para:
Get current registered operator name in short alphanumeric format.
In GSM/UMTS, short format can be up to 8 characters long.
Require at least android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION or android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION. Otherwise return null if the caller does not hold neither android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION nor android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get current registered operator numeric id.
Docs.value: numeric format of operator, null if unregistered or unknown

remarks.para:
Get current registered operator numeric id.
In GSM/UMTS, numeric format is 3 digit country code plus 2 or 3 digit network code.
Require at least android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION or android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION. Otherwise return null if the caller does not hold neither android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION nor android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
